data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gonzalez-Vaquero, Rocio Ana, Roig-Alsina, Arturo (2009): The bee genus Ruizantheda (Hymenoptera: Halictidae), its scope and description of a new species. Zootaxa 2282: 62-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.191215
